long_description: Inov8 Road-X 233 road-running shoes for women are perfect for running long distances in a minimalist shoe with a touch of cushioning. Breathable polyester mesh uppers feature thermoplastic urethane overlays for support. Polyester linings offer moisture management to keep feet dry and comfortable. Injection-molded EVA midsoles offer lightweight support and cushioning; 6mm heel-to-drop gives a low-to-ground foot position. Dynamic polymer bands run the length of feet, giving support and a kick of energy with every step. Sticky rubber outsoles on the Inov8 Road-X 233 running shoes offer sure footing on wet and dry surfaces. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly.
short_description: Inov8 Road-X 233 road-running shoes for women are perfect for running long distances in a minimalist shoe with a touch of cushioning.
